name: Revenge of the GraveHunters
description:
Play as the lighthouse keeper,  who discovers something wrong when he hears disturbing noises outside his home. Upon investigating, he quickly finds a group of derange killers with a malicious agenda .

Gameplay Features:

- Various weapons and combat/stealth strategies to survive a hostile environment through a first-person perspective.

- Save system for players can save and load their progress between sessions.

- Key system / item pickups along with narrative note system.

- Variety of enemies with a killer attitude.

-Runtime is between 45mins-1hr.

- Content Warning -

-Blood, and gore,

-Violence

-Strong language
